convos.body: I am new to this city and wanted to know a good hotel to stay at
what is your budget for the hotel?
there is Air BnB, motels, but also expensive hotels like Hilton
I don't stay in hotels that are more expensive that $100 a night as a rule
how many nights will you stay?
there is a coupon available for Hilton if you want
I usually stay three nights all the time because it is my weekend getaway
ok, I found some hotels that fit your budget range
the most expensive is $89 a night
